item.title: JadeCTF2022 BitSetGo
item.description: Bit Set Go is a reversing challenge that was part of the 2022 Jade CTF. We were given a binary and its output, and had to find the flag. Overview output consists of 41 seemingly random bytes: 0206541B 175B135B 17375C17 0C3A5C11 37510409 15125C16 370B5811 370D550F 1E2E312B 000C0402 37 bitsetgo is a 64-bit ELF go binary containing debug symbols. By running it, we see that it reads the two files flag.txt and key.

item.title: Tanka Theme Demo
item.description: Tanka is a Bootstrap-based minimalist theme for Hugo. Vik, Iceland. Photo by Adam Jang. Typography Follows the Bootstrap typography. h1 Heading h2 Heading h3 Heading h4 Heading h5 Heading h6 Heading This is bold text This is bold text This is italic text This is italic text Deleted text Block quotes are written like so. They can span multiple paragraphs, if you like. Some text, and some code and then a nice plain link with title.

item.title: Bootstrap 4 Components
item.description: Some useful Bootstrap 4 components are listed below.
